Calculates best case and worst case for emission profile at product level

Source: R/best_case_worst_case_emission_profile.R
best_case_worst_case_emission_profile.Rd

Calculates best case and worst case for emission profile at product level

Usage

best_case_worst_case_emission_profile(data)

Arguments

data

Dataframe. Emissions profile product level output

Value

A dataframe

Examples

product <- unnest_product(toy_profile_emissions_impl_output())

product |> best_case_worst_case_emission_profile()
#> # A tibble: 456 × 36
#>    companies_id       company_name country emission_profile benchmark ep_product
